Saint Seiya: The Lost Canvas ― Season 2
聖闘士星矢 THE LOST CANVAS 冥王神話 第2章
The story continuous with Tenma, Yato and Yuzuriha trying to reach Hades' Castle to stop him from finishing the Lost Canvas. By doing so, they can win the Holy War.
